name: Find Out Your Respo
description:
||story||

In this you are a man has are no responsibility in our Life.

one day devil kidnaps he 
and Devil say you have no responsibility .

and its your punishment for this thing go and find your responsibility in your mind and this place is your Dark mind
 and they Red blocks is your negative thinking.and the gold is progress of finding the responsibility and get lighten 
your world and get success.

This Game is made in 2 Days for Weekly Game jam :)

this is only 3Level but i made some more level in the near future.

                     keep enjoying yum Game jam
